passage_text: For the House of Representatives the minimum age is 25, for the Senate the minimum age age is 30. query_text: how old do you have to be to run for congress
passage_text: Quick Answer. In the United States as of 2014, candidates for Congress must be 25 years old to run for a seat in the House of Representatives and 30 years old to run for a seat in the Senate. Other countries have other age minimums for their respective legislative bodies.
